TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit StatusBarPanel extends System.ComponentModel.Component implements class System.ComponentModel.ISupportInitialize
Public Class StatusBarPanel Inherits Component Implements ISupportInitialize

summary.span: 表示 控件中的一个面板。

span.span: Represents a panel in a control.

summary.span: 虽然 控件对以前版本的 控件的功能进行替换和添加，但是考虑到向后兼容性和将来的使用（如果您选择），仍然保留了 。

span.span: Although the control replaces and adds functionality to the control of previous versions, is retained for both backward compatibility and future use if you choose.

remarks.format: ## Remarks A表示中的单个面板的控件。A represents an individual panel in the of a control. A可以包含文本和/或可用于反映应用程序的状态的图标。A can contain text and/or an icon that can be used to reflect the status of an application. 使用，可通过访问属性控制，用于以检索、 添加或删除个人。Use the , accessible through the property of a control, to retrieve, add, or remove an individual . 提供使你能够修改中的面板的显示方式的属性控件。The provides properties that enable you to modify the display behavior of a panel within a control. 你可以使用属性，以显示一个面板中的图标。You can use the property to display an icon within a panel. 此属性可以用于提供的图形表示形式在应用程序的状态。This property can be used to provide a graphical representation of state in an application. 属性使您能够指定文本和/或一个图标在面板内的对齐方式。The property enables you to specify how text and/or an icon is aligned within the panel. 若要确保，你面板的大小以适合面板的文本，可以使用属性自动调整大小以适合面板的文本，或以填充剩余的面板空间内控件。To ensure that your panel is sized properly to fit the text of the panel, you can use the property to automatically resize the panel to fit the text of the panel or to fill the remaining space within the control. 属性使您能够指定要确保它不会小于它旨在显示的数据的面板的最小宽度。The property enables you to specify a minimum width for the panel to ensure that it does not get smaller than the data it is intended to display. 控件通常用于显示帮助信息或有关你的应用程序的状态信息。The control is typically used to display Help information or state information about your application. 通常情况下，务必在面板中显示有关显示的数据的其他信息。Often, it is important to display additional information about data that is presented in a panel. 你可以使用属性时在鼠标指针停放在面板上显示信息。You can use the property to display information whenever the mouse pointer rests on a panel. 尽管控件通常用于显示文本的信息，你还可以提供你自己的类型的显示到。Although the control is typically used to display textual information, you can also provide your own type of display to a . 属性使您能够指定如何将绘制。The property enables you to specify how the will be drawn. 默认情况下，属性用于显示的值属性 (一个图标，如果在指定属性)。By default, the property is used to display the value of the property (and an icon, if specified in the property). 如果该属性设置为，到面板，可以绘制你自己的信息。If the property is set to , you can draw your own information into the panel. 此功能可用于在面板上绘制一个进度栏或一个动画的图标。You can use this feature to draw a progress bar or an animated icon in the panel. 当你创建的实例类，将读/写属性设置为初始值。When you create an instance of the class, the read/write properties are set to initial values. 有关这些值的列表，请参阅构造函数。For a list of these values, see the constructor. ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建控件在窗体上，添加两个对象。The following code example creates a control on a form and adds two objects. 第一个命名`panel1`，显示的应用程序状态文本。The first , named `panel1`, displays status text for an application. 第二个命名`panel2`、 显示当前日期，并使用属性类来显示当前时间。The second , named `panel2`, displays the current date and uses the property of the class to display the current time. 该示例使用属性以确保显示多个面板而不是一个标准面板，并使用属性来访问方法若要添加到面板。The example uses the property to ensure that the panels are displayed instead of a standard panel, and it uses the property to access the method of the to add the panels to the . 此示例还使用， ， ，和属性，以初始化对象。The example also uses the , , , and properties to initialize the objects. 此示例假定在此示例中定义的方法定义并从的构造函数调用。This example assumes that the method defined in the example is defined and called from the constructor of a . [!code-cpp[StatusBar and StatusBarPanel Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/StatusBar and StatusBarPanel Example/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[StatusBar and StatusBarPanel Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/StatusBar and StatusBarPanel Example/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[StatusBar and StatusBarPanel Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/StatusBar and StatusBarPanel Example/VB/form1.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当你创建的实例，以下的读/写属性设置为初始值。When you create an instance of , the following read/write properties are set to initial values. |PropertyProperty|初始值Initial value| |--------------|-------------------| ||| ||| ||| ||`null`| ||1010| ||| ||长度为零的字符串。A zero-length string.| ||长度为零的字符串。A zero-length string.| ||100100| 你可以更改任何通过单独属性调用这些属性的值。You can change the value for any of these properties through a separate call to the property. ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建控件在窗体上，添加两个对象。The following code example creates a control on a form and adds two objects. 第一个命名`panel1`，显示的应用程序状态文本。The first , named `panel1`, displays status text for an application. 第二个命名`panel2`、 显示当前日期，并使用属性类来显示当前时间。The second , named `panel2`, displays the current date and uses the property of the class to display the current time. 该示例使用属性以确保显示多个面板而不是一个标准面板，并使用属性来访问方法若要添加到面板。The example uses the property to ensure that the panels are displayed instead of a standard panel, and it uses the property to access the method of the to add the panels to the . 此示例还使用， ， ，和属性，以初始化对象。The example also uses the , , , and properties to initialize the objects. 此示例假定在此示例中定义的方法定义并从的构造函数调用。This example assumes that the method defined in the example is defined and called from the constructor of a . [!code-cpp[StatusBar and StatusBarPanel Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/StatusBar and StatusBarPanel Example/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[StatusBar and StatusBarPanel Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/StatusBar and StatusBarPanel Example/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[StatusBar and StatusBarPanel Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/StatusBar and StatusBarPanel Example/VB/form1.vb#1)]

summary.span: 获取或设置状态栏面板中文本和图标的对齐方式。

span.span: Gets or sets the alignment of text and icons within the status bar panel.
One of the values.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 你可以使用此属性水平对齐文本和/或图标分配给在面板的边框内的属性。You can use this property to horizontally align the text and/or icon assigned to the property within the borders of the panel. 文本和图标可以对齐到左、 右或的中心。Text and icons can be aligned to the left, right, or center of the . 将没有办法独立位置中的图标。There is no way to independently position an icon within the . 例如，您不能放置到左侧的图标时对齐右侧的文本。For example, you cannot position an icon to the left side of the while aligning the text on the right side. 无论中文本的对齐文本的左侧始终位于图标。The icon is always positioned to the left side of the text regardless of how the text is aligned. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用， ， ， ，和属性，以及如何处理事件。The following code example demonstrates how to use the , , , , and properties, and how to handle the event. 若要运行该示例，请将以下代码粘贴到窗体中。To run the example, paste the following code into a form. 调用`InitializeStatusBarPanels`窗体的构造函数中的方法或事件处理方法。Call the `InitializeStatusBarPanels` method in the form's constructor or event-handling method. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelExample#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelExample/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelExample#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelExample/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelExample#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelExample/VB/form1.vb#1)]

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否自动调整状态栏面板的大小。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the status bar panel is automatically resized.
One of the values.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 对象设置为通过设置为这些面板具有优先级值。 objects set to have precedence over those panels set to the value. 例如，具有其属性设置为如果缩短与属性设置为需要该空间。For example, a that has its property set to is shortened if a with the property set to requires that space. 你可以使用以确保内容正确地显示在包含多个面板的控件。You can use to ensure that the contents of a are properly displayed in a control that contains more than one panel. 例如，你可能想包含要与它显示的文本量会自动调整文本的面板 ()，而另一个面板一个所有者描述的进度栏将需要是固定的大小以显示 ().For example, you might want a panel that contains text to adjust automatically to the amount of text it is displaying (), while another panel on the that displays an owner-drawn progress bar would need to be a fixed size (). ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建控件在窗体上，添加两个对象。The following code example creates a control on a form and adds two objects. 第一个命名`panel1`，显示的应用程序状态文本。The first , named `panel1`, displays status text for an application. 第二个命名`panel2`、 显示当前日期，并使用属性类来显示当前时间。The second , named `panel2`, displays the current date and uses the property of the class to display the current time. 该示例使用属性以确保显示多个面板而不是一个标准面板，并使用属性来访问方法若要添加到面板。The example uses the property to ensure that the panels are displayed instead of a standard panel, and it uses the property to access the method of the to add the panels to the . 此示例还使用， ， ，和属性，以初始化对象。The example also uses the , , , and properties to initialize the objects. 此示例假定在此示例中定义的方法定义并从的构造函数调用。This example assumes that the method defined in the example is defined and called from the constructor of a . [!code-cpp[StatusBar and StatusBarPanel Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/StatusBar and StatusBarPanel Example/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[StatusBar and StatusBarPanel Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/StatusBar and StatusBarPanel Example/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[StatusBar and StatusBarPanel Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/StatusBar and StatusBarPanel Example/VB/form1.vb#1)]

span.span: Begins the initialization of a .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法用于启动窗体上使用或由另一个组件的组件的初始化。This method is used to start the initialization of a component that is used on a form or used by another component. 方法初始化已结束。The method ends the initialization. 使用和方法阻止控件完全初始化之前使用。Using the and methods prevents the control from being used before it is fully initialized.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 你可以使用此属性来区分从其他面板中的一个面板控件。You can use this property to differentiate a panel from other panels in a control. ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建控件在窗体上，添加两个对象。The following code example creates a control on a form and adds two objects. 第一个命名`panel1`，显示的应用程序状态文本。The first , named `panel1`, displays status text for an application. 第二个命名`panel2`、 显示当前日期，并使用属性类来显示当前时间。The second , named `panel2`, displays the current date and uses the property of the class to display the current time. 该示例使用属性以确保显示多个面板而不是一个标准面板，并使用属性来访问方法若要添加到面板。The example uses the property to ensure that the panels are displayed instead of a standard panel, and it uses the property to access the method of the to add the panels to the . 此示例还使用， ， ，和属性，以初始化对象。The example also uses the , , , and properties to initialize the objects. 此示例假定在此示例中定义的方法定义并从的构造函数调用。This example assumes that the method defined in the example is defined and called from the constructor of a . [!code-cpp[StatusBar and StatusBarPanel Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/StatusBar and StatusBarPanel Example/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[StatusBar and StatusBarPanel Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/StatusBar and StatusBarPanel Example/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[StatusBar and StatusBarPanel Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/StatusBar and StatusBarPanel Example/VB/form1.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance void Dispose(bool disposing) cil managed
Protected Overrides Sub Dispose (disposing As Boolean)

param.name: disposing
param.span: 若要释放托管资源和非托管资源，则为 ；若仅释放非托管资源，则为 。

span.span: to release both managed and unmanaged resources; to release only unmanaged resources.

summary.span: 释放由 占用的非托管资源，还可以另外再释放托管资源。

span.span: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the and optionally releases the managed resources.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法称为由公共`Dispose()`方法和方法。This method is called by the public `Dispose()` method and the method. `Dispose()` 调用受保护`Dispose(Boolean)`方法替换`disposing`参数设置为`true`。`Dispose()` invokes the protected `Dispose(Boolean)` method with the `disposing` parameter set to `true`. 调用`Dispose`与`disposing`设置为`false`。 invokes `Dispose` with `disposing` set to `false`. 当 `disposing` 参数为 `true` 时，此方法释放该 引用的、由任何托管对象持有的全部资源。When the `disposing` parameter is `true`, this method releases all resources held by any managed objects that this references. 此方法调用每个引用对象的 `Dispose()` 方法。This method invokes the `Dispose()` method of each referenced object.

para.span: 可以由其他对象多次调用。

span.span: can be called multiple times by other objects.

para.span: 在重写请注意不要引用已释放的以前调用中的对象。

span.span: When overriding be careful not to reference objects that have been previously disposed of in an earlier call to .

para.span: 有关如何实现详细信息，请参阅[实现 Dispose 方法](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md)。

span.span: For more information about how to implement , see [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md).

para.span: 有关详细信息和，请参阅[清洗向上非托管资源](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md)和[重写 Finalize 方法](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8026cb68-fe93-43fc-96c1-c09ad7d64cd3)。

span.span: For more information about and , see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md) and [Overriding the Finalize Method](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8026cb68-fe93-43fc-96c1-c09ad7d64cd3).

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Drawing::Icon ^ Icon { System::Drawing::Icon ^ get(); void set(System::Drawing::Icon ^ value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置要显示在状态栏面板中的图标。

span.span: Gets or sets the icon to display within the status bar panel.

value.span: 表示要显示在面板中的图标。

span.span: An that represents the icon to display in the panel.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性可用于显示一个图标表示你的应用程序或你的应用程序内的进程的状态。You can use this property to display an icon that represents the state of your application or a process within your application. 例如，可以显示中的图标指出保存操作的文件是否正在进行或已完成。For example, you can display an icon in a to indicate whether a file save operation is in progress or complete. > [!NOTE] > 将没有办法独立位置中的图标。There is no way to independently position an icon within the . 例如，您不能放置到左侧的图标对齐上右侧使用的文本时属性。For example, you cannot position an icon to the left side of the while aligning the text on the right side using the property. 无论文本的对齐方式的面板的文本的左侧始终位于图标。The icon is always positioned to the left side of the panel's text regardless of how the text is aligned.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property int MinWidth { int get(); void set(int value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置 控件中状态栏面板的最小允许宽度。

span.span: Gets or sets the minimum allowed width of the status bar panel within the control.

value.span: 的最小宽度（以像素为单位）。

span.span: The minimum width, in pixels, of the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性时属性设置为或以防止从自动调整大小太小的宽度。The property is used when the property is set to or to prevent the from automatically resizing to a width that is too small. 当属性设置为、属性自动设置为相同的值属性。When the property is set to , the property is automatically set to the same value as the property.

exception.span: 为该属性指定的值小于零。

span.span: A value less than 0 is assigned to the property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 你可以使用此属性以指示是否显示文本或面板作为一个所有者绘制的管理是否。You can use this property to indicate whether a displays text or whether the panel is managed as an owner-drawn . 若要确定需要创建的事件处理程序、 绘制事件控件。To determine when a needs to be drawn, create an event handler for the event of the control. 作为参数传递给事件处理程序的事件使您能够确定哪个面板需要绘制。The passed as a parameter to an event handler of the event enables you to determine which panel needs to be drawn. 还提供了对象时可使用在上执行绘制任务。The also provides a object you can use to perform drawing tasks on the . ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性，委托，类，枚举，和属性。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property, delegate, class, enumeration, and property. 若要运行该示例，请将以下代码粘贴到窗体中。To run the example, paste the following code into a form. 调用`InitializeStatusBarPanels`窗体的构造函数中的方法或事件方法。Call the `InitializeStatusBarPanels` method in the form's constructor or event-method. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarDrawItemEventHandler#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarDrawItemEventHandler/CPP/form1.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarDrawItemEventHandler#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarDrawItemEventHandler/CS/form1.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarDrawItemEventHandler#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarDrawItemEventHandler/VB/form1.vb#2)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ Text { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置状态栏面板的文本。

span.span: Gets or sets the text of the status bar panel.
The text displayed in the panel.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性表示的文本时，所显示属性设置为。This property represents the text that is displayed when the property is set to . 你可以使用此属性显示关于你的应用程序中的信息控件。You can use this property to display information about your application in a control. 例如，你可以使用属性来显示帮助信息，当用户将鼠标移到菜单或显示的名称和应用程序中打开的文件的位置。For example, you can use the property to display Help information when the user moves the mouse over a menu or to display the name and location of a file that is opened in an application. 若要对齐文本，使用属性。To align the text within a , use the property. ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建控件在窗体上，添加两个对象。The following code example creates a control on a form and adds two objects. 第一个命名`panel1`，显示的应用程序状态文本。The first , named `panel1`, displays status text for an application. 第二个命名`panel2`、 显示当前日期，并使用属性类来显示当前时间。The second , named `panel2`, displays the current date and uses the property of the class to display the current time. 该示例使用属性以确保显示多个面板而不是一个标准面板，并使用属性来访问方法若要添加到面板。The example uses the property to ensure that the panels are displayed instead of a standard panel, and it uses the property to access the method of the to add the panels to the . 此示例还使用， ， ，和属性，以初始化对象。The example also uses the , , , and properties to initialize the objects. 此示例假定在此示例中定义的方法定义并从的构造函数调用。This example assumes that the method defined in the example is defined and called from the constructor of a . [!code-cpp[StatusBar and StatusBarPanel Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/StatusBar and StatusBarPanel Example/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[StatusBar and StatusBarPanel Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/StatusBar and StatusBarPanel Example/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[StatusBar and StatusBarPanel Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/StatusBar and StatusBarPanel Example/VB/form1.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ ToolTipText { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置与状态栏面板关联的工具提示文本。

span.span: Gets or sets ToolTip text associated with the status bar panel.
The ToolTip text for the panel.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 你可以使用此属性以工具提示中显示其他信息，当鼠标指针停留在。You can use this property to display additional information in a ToolTip when the mouse pointer rests on a . 例如，可以显示工具提示提供数据的传输速度显示的文件传输的状态。For example, you can display a ToolTip that provides data transfer speed for a that displays the status of a file transfer. 若要显示有关你的应用程序中的其他控件的工具提示，请使用控件。To display ToolTips for other controls in your application, use the control. ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建控件在窗体上，添加两个对象。The following code example creates a control on a form and adds two objects. 第一个命名`panel1`，显示的应用程序状态文本。The first , named `panel1`, displays status text for an application. 第二个命名`panel2`、 显示当前日期，并使用属性类来显示当前时间。The second , named `panel2`, displays the current date and uses the property of the class to display the current time. 该示例使用属性以确保显示多个面板而不是一个标准面板，并使用属性来访问方法若要添加到面板。The example uses the property to ensure that the panels are displayed instead of a standard panel, and it uses the property to access the method of the to add the panels to the . 此示例还使用， ， ，和属性，以初始化对象。The example also uses the , , , and properties to initialize the objects. 此示例假定在此示例中定义的方法定义并从的构造函数调用。This example assumes that the method defined in the example is defined and called from the constructor of a . [!code-cpp[StatusBar and StatusBarPanel Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/StatusBar and StatusBarPanel Example/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[StatusBar and StatusBarPanel Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/StatusBar and StatusBarPanel Example/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[StatusBar and StatusBarPanel Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/StatusBar and StatusBarPanel Example/VB/form1.vb#1)]

summary.span: 检索一个字符串，该字符串包含面板的信息。

span.span: Retrieves a string that contains information about the panel.

returns.span: 返回一个字符串，该字符串包含控件的类名以及控件所含的文本。

span.span: Returns a string that contains the class name for the control and the text it contains.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property int Width { int get(); void set(int value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置 控件中状态栏面板的宽度。

span.span: Gets or sets the width of the status bar panel within the control.
The width, in pixels, of the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性始终反映的实际宽度，并且不能小于属性。The property always reflects the actual width of a and cannot be smaller than the property. 自动调整大小的宽度内容的，你可以使用属性。To automatically resize the width of the to the contents of the , you can use the property. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用， ， ， ，和属性，以及如何处理事件。The following code example demonstrates how to use the , , , , and properties, and how to handle the event. 若要运行该示例，请将以下代码粘贴到窗体中。To run the example, paste the following code into a form. 调用`InitializeStatusBarPanels`窗体的构造函数中的方法或事件处理方法。Call the `InitializeStatusBarPanels` method in the form's constructor or event-handling method. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelExample#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelExample/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelExample#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelExample/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelExample#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelExample/VB/form1.vb#1)]

exception.span: 指定的宽度小于 属性的值。

span.span: The width specified is less than the value of the property.
